#Feedforward Model 1

```{r}
getwd()
preds <- read.csv("C:/Users/Gerhard/Documents/msc-hpc/feedforward_python/results/feed_forward_1_results.csv",header = F,sep="")

actuals <- read.fwf("C:/Users/Gerhard/Documents/msc-hpc/feedforward_python/results/feed_forward_1_y_test.csv",
                    widths = c(3,3),header = F)

actuals <- na.omit(actuals)

model1 <- data.frame(cbind(preds[,2],actuals[,2]))
```

```{r}
names(model1) <- c("prediction","actual")

hist(model1$prediction,breaks = 1000,main="Histogram of first feedforward model's prediction probabilities",
     xlab="First Feedforward Model's Predictions")

unique(model1$prediction)

summary(model1$prediction)
```
